Text.Page:
I want the weapons of the {@LinkCreature:20#30114001#ossugon centurions} and the {@LinkCreature:20#30031000#skeleton spearmen}. I want to study them and see how they've held up over all these years.

I mean yes, they're rusty, but they've yet to fall apart.

I have to know why. Collect them for me. I don't care what you do with the skeletons.

You clearly have more arms than you let on to be able to bring so many back by yourself.

Anyway, thank you. I'll get to them right away.
I want to know why those weapons aren't broken! I want to know, so I need you to bring them to me!
